title: (x) really tiny website menus - Albertus {Mark S}
content:
Hey All,   
   
I have a sample I need to ID but its so small I cant be sure what it is. Looking at it I know I've seen (and probably IDd) this before, but its escaping me right now. Anyone got a sharp enough eye to ID such a small sample?   
   
Thanks!   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054645im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68924.gif)   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054645im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68925.gif)
author: fs_jeff

comments.content: That would be [Albertus](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054645/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/albertus/mt/testdrive.html?s=production+%26+design&p=48), but I'm not sure about the weight.

Fantastic -   
   
Thanks a lot Mark, I would of never gotten that one on my own... Cheers!
